```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(lme4)
library(tidyverse)
library(latex2exp)
library(ggpubr)

dat <- read.csv("../data/N_fert.csv")

m1 <- lm(Yield_SY ~ Total_N + I(Total_N^2), data= dat)
dat$residuals <- resid(m1)
dat$yhat <- predict(m1)

theme_set(theme_pubr())
```
